amendment.description: An amendment numbered 248 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to seek to ensure that United States Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) continue to work with the HUD Office of Inspector General (OIG) to incorporate findings and recommendations of certain OIG investigations related to the Alexander County Public Housing Authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A087) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A087) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A087) offered by Mr. Bost.
